title: Backgammon Game SFX Pack
description: In this Backgammon SFX Pack, we offer you 100+ unique sounds of the famous game backgammon, which has been inherited from first the Roman and then the Ottoman times to the world.
longDescription:
In this Backgammon SFX Pack, we offer you 102 unique sounds of the famous game backgammon, which has been inherited from first the Roman and then the Ottoman times to the world. You can find different sounds of dice and game pieces from the game. Pick from 102 files of dice rolling, spinning pieces, wood and plastic boards and more. If you are looking for high quality board game sounds, this pack is right for you.


Flipping, dice rolling, spilling, dropping, shaking, rolling, spinning pieces, wood and plastic boards and more. They come in hard, soft, slow, medium pace, random, single, handful, in varied speeds, and different holders. 100+ sounds in 16bit-48kHz .WAV with a multitude of performances and easy to navigate naming.


The texture of the sounds is clean, realistic, and flexible for customization. Plus, you get the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail! You can now set the bar higher for all your Foley needs, multi-genre, adventure or slot games, motion and video projects!


Keywords including Actions, Parts, Equipment and Style


Backgammon Board game Flipping, dice rolling, spilling, dropping, shaking, rolling, spinning pieces, wood plastic boards casino slot game.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 102

Number of Audio Cues: 102

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 Bit/ 48 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: No
